On this page

Lue UI ​

轻量级 Vue 3 UI 组件库。

快速开始 ​

bash
npm install @alinaliao/lue-ui

## 快速开始 使用方式

import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import LueUI from '@alinaliao/lue-ui'
import '@alinaliao/lue-ui/dist/lue-ui.css'

const app = createApp(App)
app.use(LueUI)
app.mount('#app')
